Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.board

Class DecoratedWarehousePlayerBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.board.DecoratedPlayerBoard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.board.DecoratedWarehousePlayerBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlayerBoard, java.io.Serializable
public class DecoratedWarehousePlayerBoard
extends DecoratedPlayerBoard
implements java.io.Serializable
This class represents the Extra Warehouse Space leader card decoration for a Player Board.
